item.description:
Take advantage of this this rare chance to see the Thurderbirds and much more at the Air Show this end of August.

Where:
Portsmouth International Airport at Pease Tradeport, Portsmouth, NH

When:
Saturday August 13th and Sunday August 14th, gates open at 8AM

What:
The schedule runs from 9AM-5PM each day, with the Thunderbirds scheduled for just after 3PM. There will much more than just the Thunderbirds, though, both in the air and on the ground. For details, see:

  • Featured Performers
  • Static (on the ground) Aircraft
  • Performance Schedule

 

How Much:
Tickets are $20 in advance, $25 at the gate. Seniors, military, and kids 6-11 get a discount. Under 6 are free. Parking is $10.

But wait! There's more. Thee are additional offerings, such as the Flight Line club, which includes all the beer you can drink, on-site reserved parking, and access to air conditioned bathrooms for $125.

For more on general pricing and to order tickets online, click here.

But that's not all, there's EVEN MORE! If you're like me, you'll want that special treatment as a photographer and here's your chance to grab it. You can purchase special passes for photographers and get the VIP treatment. The Air Show Photo Tour runs 7-9AM, includes media parking pass, and runs $50 per day or $80 per weekend. Then, for an additional $25/day or $40/weekend, there's the Photo Pit add-on, which gives you:

  • Exclusive photography area on the flight line during the show
  • Upgrade available only to Photo Tour purchasers
  • LIMITED number of passes are available
  • Water to be provided all day
  • Area for credentialed Pit Pass holders only (no family or additional guests)
  • $8 in food vouchers issued for use in public concession area

If you missed the Blue Angels show last year, or didn't get the Photo Pit pass, you'll want to take advantage of it this year - it's the best way to see the show. You can find out more and purchase Photo Tour tickets here.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Join up with the Photo Tour.
item.name: New England Air Show with the Thunderbirds
